welcome_message_body: Welcome to Heiligenhaus, Germany! This charming city is known for its historic buildings, delicious local cuisine, and picturesque scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Heiligenhaus has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
